articles.title: Thiago Silva tips 'arrogant' Premier League star to take 2022 World Cup by storm - The Mirror
articles.description: EXCLUSIVE: Gabriel Martinelli was a surprise selection in Brazil's World Cup 2022 squad, but Chelsea defender Thiago Silva has hyped the Arsenal forward ahead of their opener against Serbia
articles.content:
Thiago Silva reckons the gift of the Gab can help fire five-time winners Brazil to fresh World Cup glory.
